name: Alley Bash
description: Alley Bash takes you through a top-down action adventure in a modern fantasy setting.  As you roam the streets of a sprawling city, you come face-to-face with such enemies as Mafia Goblins, Wizard Lizards, and an Unsuspecting Gentleman in a Trench-Coat!  But your greatest enemy is your School Bully, who is putting you through a test of courage to prove you're the best young adventurer in the city.  Your tasks include participating in free-for-all arena, exploring the depths of a maze, as well as exploring a dance club in search classic vinyl records.  Grab your sword and slingshot and venture forth on this quirky, retro adventure!
